m_szDocTitle: Tesla (TSLA) Stock Down in Pre-Market Trading as Competitors Launch Electric Cars - TheStreet
m_szDocSumamry: Tesla (TSLA) Stock Down in Pre-Market Trading as Competitors Launch Electric Cars By Amanda Gomez | 09/16/15 - 08:53 AM EDT Reprint NEW YORK ( TheStreet ) -- Tesla ( TSLA - Get Report ) stock is falling by 0.11% to $253.28 in pre-market trading on Wednesday, after reports confirmed Mercedes-Benz is working on an electric vehicle that could be available in 2018, Automotive News said. Mercedes-Benz, a Daimler ( DDAIF ) brand, is working on a vehicle that will have a range of 250 to 310 miles, Daimler board member Thomas Weber told Automotive News. The new electric vehicle will not compete with M
